Description.Name: Arrow IV Homing Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Homing Arrow IV missiles will home in onto one target, specified by a friendly TAG. If no target can be found, it is designed to self-destruct before impact. Due to the targeting happeing in flight, homing missiles will be fired immediately.

Arrow IV Homing Ammo (Double) Bins each contain 13 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
